verses.verse: For <S%H3117><s%>, behold, the day comes <S%H935><s%>, that shall burn <S%H1197><s%> as a oven <S%H8574><s%>; and all the proud <S%H2086><s%>, Yes <S%H6213><s%>, and all that do wickedly <S%H7564><s%>, shall be stubble <S%H7179><s%>: and the day <S%H3117><s%> that comes <S%H935><s%> shall burn them up <S%H3857><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, that it shall leave <S%H5800><s%> them neither root <S%H8328><s%> nor branch <S%H6057><s%>.
